column5: Location is convenient to restaurants, shopping, and is an easy access to major highways, family-friendly activities, the airport, nightlife, downtown and uptown. Beds are comfortable, common area is great for enjoying home based activities, and there is a beautiful courtyard you can relax and enjoy the Koi ponds. The house is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and even big groups. The house is centrally located in a great area of Dallas!
